title: NVIDIA Corp (NVDA) is down 1.32% Tuesday In Premarket Trading
text:
NVIDIA Corp (NVDA) has fallen Tuesday morning, with the stock declining -1.32% in pre-market trading to 488.7. 


NVDA's short-term technical score of 97 indicates that the stock has traded more bullishly over the last month than 97% of stocks on the market. In the Semiconductors industry, which ranks 33 out of 146 industries, NVDA ranks higher than 97% of stocks.

NVIDIA Corp has risen 5.90% over the past month, closing at $465.66 on December 5. During this period of time, the stock fell as low as $455.03 and as high as $504.33. NVDA has an average analyst recommendation of Strong Buy. The company has an average price target of $648.63.





 NVDA has an Overall Score of 77. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on NVDA!
See Full NVDA Report



NVIDIA Corp has a Long-Term Technical rank of 80. This means that trading over the last 200 trading days has placed the company in the upper half of stocks with 20% of the market scoring higher. In the Semiconductors industry which is number 58 by this metric, NVDA ranks better than 58% of stocks.



Important Dates for Investors in NVDA:


-NVIDIA Corp is set to release earnings on 2024-02-19. Over the last 12 months, the company has reported EPS of $7.59.


-We do not have a set dividend date for NVIDIA Corp at this time.
